pages.text: Wo que yi shi ta zai da dishang deshi, wo shangci ta chuli wanshi de tujing.

zhidao ta daodale riluo zhi chu, ta juede taiyang shi luo zai hei ni yuan zhong, ta zai na hei ni yuan pang faxian yi zhong ren. Wo shuo: Zuo lei gai er naiying a! Ni huo chengzhi tamen, huo shandai tamen.
Ta shuo: Zhiyu bu yi zhe, wo jiang chengfa ta, ranhou ta de zhuzai jiang ba ta zhao qu, jiayi yanli chengchu.
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang xiangshou zui youhou de baochou, wo jiang mingling ta zuo jianyi de shiqing.
Suihou ta you zunxun yitiao lu,
yizhi zou dao ri chu zhi chu, ta faxian taiyang zheng shaizhe yi zhong ren, wo meiyou gei tamen fang ri shai de gongju.
Shishi jiu xiang shuo di nayang. Wo yi che zhi ta yongyou de yiqie.
Suihou, ta you zunxun yitiao lu,
yizhi dao ta daodale liang shan zhi jian de shihou, ta faxian qianmian youyi zhong ren, jihu bu dong (ta de) hua.
Tamen shuo: Zuo lei gai er naiying a! Ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe, dique zai difang daoluan, women xiang ni jingong, wu qing ni zai women he tamen zhi jian jianzhu yizuo bilei, hao ma?
Ta shuo: Wo de zhu shi wo nenggou xiangshou de, youwei youmei. Nimen yi renli fuzhu wo, wo jiu zai nimen he tamen zhi jian jianzhu yizuo bilei.

Nimen na tie kuai lai gei wo ba. Daole ta dui man liang shan zhi jian de shihou, ta shuo: Nimen la fengxiang ba. Daole ta shi tie kuai hong ru huoyan de shihou, ta shuo: Nimen na rong tong lai gei wo, wo jiu ba ta qingzhu zai bilei shang.
Tamen jiu buneng pandeng, ye buneng zao kong.
